meanings.definition: Of or relating to the dawn or the east.
meanings.sent1: The eoan sky was painted in shades of pink and orange as the sun rose.
meanings.sent2: She loved waking up early to witness the eoan beauty of the sunrise.
meanings.sent3: The eoan glow of the morning sky made her feel hopeful for the day ahead.
meanings.sent4: The eoan light peeking over the horizon signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The eoan colors of dawn painted the sky in a breathtaking display.

meanings.definition: A person or thing from the dawn of history or from the east.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologist discovered an eoan artifact from ancient times.
meanings.sent2: She was fascinated by the stories of eoan explorers from the east.
meanings.sent3: The eoan traveler brought exotic spices from distant lands.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom was as ancient as an eoan relic.
meanings.sent5: The eoan culture preserved its traditions for generations.
